Biography

I was born in West Croydon, south London in the late 1960's. Played football for Crystal Palace youth, county tennis and am a 50 break man at snooker. After completing A-Levels I worked in insurance for 3 years, all the while performing at the Croydon Youth Theatre. When I felt ready I went to drama school in London - The Webber Douglas Academy of Dramatic Art. Left in 1990 so I am celebrating 30 years in the business!
